decision_conditions: The amendments sought cannot be regarded as a non-material amendment as the change proposed is an increased width of the extension to 2m from the common boundary with a spayed section to increase the bedroom size and the introduction of a feature window to the front elevation; an assessment needs to be made on the impact on amenity to neighbouring properties and the impact on the street / garden scene.
The submission of a fresh planning application is therefore deemed necessary in this case.
description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1201.24 dated 04/11/2024 to allow for amendments to increase width of extension to 2m from the common boundary with a spayed section to increase bedroom and introduction of feature window to front elevation (Single storey side/rear extension and part first floor rear extension alterations to front fenestration, the addition of front boundary railings with sliding gate and patio with steps to rear)
